descriptionSet.description: On this page of a film brochure, the Hindi movie "Aap To Aise Na The" from 1980 is advertised. Three of the leading actors, Raj Babbar, Ranjeeta Kaur and Deepak Parashar are depicted. The two men are seen from the side facing each other whereas Ranjeeta is pictured slightly in the back of the image, but her eyes are focusing on the viewer. She is wearing a hat as well as a pearl necklace.

inscription.text: MK Mohan Kumar's Aap To Aise Na The Ranjeeta Raj Babbar Deepak Parashar Tamanna Om Shivpuri And Madan Puri Directed by Ambrish Sangal Music Usha Khanna Written by Mushtaq Jalili Photography K.K. Mahajan

text-hi: आप तो ऐसे ना थे

description-en: On this page of a film brochure, the Hindi movie "Aap To Aise Na The" from 1980 is advertised. Three of the leading actors, Raj Babbar, Ranjeeta Kaur and Deepak Parashar are depicted. The two men are seen from the side facing each other whereas Ranjeeta is pictured slightly in the back of the image, but her eyes are focusing on the viewer. She is wearing a hat as well as a pearl necklace. (gs)

explanatory comments/crosstagging: Story line of the movie: Orphaned at a very young age, Varsha Oberoi, lives a wealthy lifestyle with her paternal uncle, Jain Oberoi, in Bombay, and has traveled world-wide. She is in love with Vijay, a middle-classed young man, who runs a small furniture store, badly in debt, and lives with his widowed mom, a younger brother, Deepu, and sister, Nanhi, who are very friendly with Varsha. Then Vijay is reunited with his childhood friend, Vikram Chawla, who is welcomed with open arms by the entire family. It is then Vijay's life turns around, he starts getting a lot of orders, gets out of debt, is able to buy a jeep to replace his motorbike, and moves to a comfortable bungalow. Then Vijay's life is turned upside down when he finds out that Vikram and Varsha are getting engaged. He meets with Varsha, who flats tells him that she prefers marrying someone richer and wealthier. Angrily he confronts Vikram, who counsels him that Varsha had never really loved him... http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0178198/ (gs)
related hyperlinks: http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0178198/director, last accessed 2012-01-18, story plot, main actors. (gs)
